reconciliation.translation[0].definition: a situation in which two people, countries etc become friendly with each other again after quarrelling
Her ex-husband had always hoped for a reconciliation.
The treaty has brought a new spirit of reconciliation on both sides.
The leadership announced a programme of national reconciliation  (=an attempt by all sides to end a war or trouble in a country).
The meeting achieved a reconciliation between the groups.
the process of finding a way that two beliefs, facts etc that are opposed to each other can both be true or successful
a reconciliation between environment and development
